name: Answering Contact Form FAQ Page Add-on
author: Mattias JÃ¶nsson

sections.description:
Answering Contact Form FAQ Page Add-on is a add-on to the Answering Contact Form. This plugin will turn the questions and answers that you have added to the Answering Contact Form database into a beautiful FAQ page with jQuery toggle. All you have to do is to paste the shortcode into a page of your choice and now you have a FAQ page.

For more information, demo and documentation go to the official plugin site answeringcontactform.com.
sections.installation:
Installation

You need Answering Contact Form for this plugin to work properly.

1. Install Answering Contact Form FAQ Page Add-on via the plugin directory or by uploading the files manually to your server.

2. Paste the shortcode [acf_faq_page] into a page of your choice.

5. All the answers that you have added in Answering Contact Form->Answers should now be displayed.
sections.faq: Go to the plugins official website answeringcontactform.com
sections.changelog:
1.0

Answering Contact Form FAQ Page Add-on was released.
